text: Breaker Morant is a 1980 Australian war biographical drama movie directed by Bruce Beresford and was based on the 1978 play of the same name by Kenneth G. Ross. It stars Edward Woodward, Jack Thompson, John Waters, Bryan Brown, Charles Tingwell, Terence Donovan, Ray Meagher, Lewis Fitz-Gerald and Russell Kiefel. It was nominated for an Academy Award in 1981. ==Other websites== * * * Breaker Morant, complete film on YouTube Category:1980 drama movies Category:1980 war movies Category:1980s biographical movies Category:Australian drama movies Category:Australian biographical movies Category:Movies directed by Bruce Beresford Category:Movies set in South Africa Category:Movies based on plays Category:Movies about lawyers Category:Movies about capital punishment Category:Movies set in the 1900s
title: Breaker Morant (movie)
